name: Moonberry Patch
description:
As an ancient deity, help populate the universe by raising the first moons! Keep them fed, entertained, and make sure to put them down for a nap when they get cranky!

_____

This was the first game jam I tried, and while it was meant to be an entry to the Godot Wild Jam #48 (https://itch.io/jam/godot-wild-jam-48), I was at least 30 minutes too late to submit an entry.

I barely have any items for the moon to interact with at the moment, and I never actually created a way to unlock the additional Moon pets, but I wanted to upload this to A) learn how to export the HTML5 files from Godot, and B) Potentially continue development on this game, because I had a lot of fun making it.
